name: Manpower Services
description: Providing skilled and experienced professionals for various industrial operations.

items.title: Skilled Workforce
items.description: Supplying trained and experienced professionals for industrial operations.

items.title: Industry Expertise
items.description: Supporting diverse sectors, including Oil & Gas, infrastructure, and manufacturing.

items.title: Efficient Execution
items.description: Ensuring high-quality results with a focus on operational excellence.

items.title: Customized Solutions
items.description: Tailored manpower services to meet client requirements.

items.title: Safety Compliance
items.description: Workforce trained in strict adherence to safety standards.

items.title: Specialized Support
items.description: Expertise in plant operations, maintenance, and shutdowns.

name: Metallic & Non-Metallic Piping
description: Providing comprehensive piping solutions tailored to client needs.

items.title: Comprehensive Piping Services
items.description: FRP/GRP, GRE/RTR, and HDPE piping and spools tailored to meet project specifications.

items.title: FRP Lining Works
items.description: Providing FRP lining for enhanced durability, performance, and lifespan of piping systems.

items.title: Advanced Installation Methods
items.description: Techniques including Coupling Joints, Lamination Joints, Flange-to-Flange Joints, and others.
High-quality materials sourced from Amantit Group, Future Pipe Industries, and ACWA.

name: Equipment Rental Services
description: Offering a wide range of certified equipment for industrial projects.

items.title: Construction and Lifting Equipment
items.description: Available for hire across Saudi Arabia.

items.title: Specialized Shutdown Equipment
items.description: Includes Buses, Coasters, Pick-up Trucks, and Hydro Jetting Equipment.
Equipment can be rented with or without crew. Certified by Aramco for safety and reliability.

name: Safety & Personal Protection Accessories
description: High-quality safety gear designed for hazardous environments.

items.description: Includes helmets, gloves, goggles, protective clothing, high-visibility vests, and steel-toe boots.
Ensuring worker safety and compliance with global safety standards using export-grade materials.

name: Hydro Jetting Industrial Services
description: Advanced hydro jetting solutions for industrial cleaning needs.

items.title: Triple Lancing
items.description: Provides exceptional cleaning efficiency with three high-pressure jets.

items.title: Rigid Lancing
items.description: Maintains a steady, powerful stream for effective cleaning.
Includes Heat Exchanger Cleaning, Tank Cleaning, Cooling Tower Cleaning, and more.
